import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create My Classes verification"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/my-classes/verifications/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Records a verification for an asset within the My Classes context. This variant applies My Classes-specific business rules and permissions.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Asset to verify within My Classes workflow.

**Workflow Example**
1. Teacher opens My Classes device roster.
2. Verifies student device is present.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/my-classes/verifications/new](/docs/api/assets/create-my-classes-asset-verification).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path), AssetVerificationTypeId, VerifiedByUserId, LocationId, IsSuccessful.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to verify","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating an asset verification.","properties":{"AssetVerificationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the verification to update. Omit when creating new."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset being verified."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp for the verification.","nullable":true},"VerifiedByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User performing the verification."},"AssetVerificationTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Verification mode identifier.","example":"web-manual"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the verification passed."},"Comments":{"type":"string","description":"Optional notes.","nullable":true},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS latitude.","nullable":true},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS longitude.","nullable":true},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Verified location."},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional room.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"External tracking identifier.","nullable":true},"AssetAuditPolicyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Associated audit policy.","nullable":true},"ActualQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Actual quantity observed.","nullable":true},"ExpectedQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Expected quantity.","nullable":true},"Flags":{"type":"integer","description":"Update entity flags (1=RunRules, 2=CheckStatus).","default":1}},"title":"UpdateAssetVerificationRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
